# chi-spinner



<!-- Auto Generated Below -->


## Properties

| Property | Attribute | Description                                                             | Type     | Default     |
| -------- | --------- | ----------------------------------------------------------------------- | -------- | ----------- |
| `color`  | `color`   | to set color of a spinner { primary, success, warning, danger, muted }. | `string` | `'primary'` |
| `size`   | `size`    | to set size of a spinner { xs, sm, sm--2, sm--3, md, lg, xl, xxl }.     | `string` | `'md'`      |
